sen.e: Gosojojin-can is way of making practice to find the knowledge of Nyorai, which is originally earned in a person who is making the ascetic practices, through knowing that pure heart itself is the knowledge of Nyorai, by finding out the dirty heart through range (way to observe the truth in Buddhism) of Yuga.

Gososojin-kan is an original practice to endow devotees with discovering the wisdom of Nyorai. This practice involved having the impure hearts of disciples attain the knowledge of Nyorai (Tathagata; perfected one) through yoga methods of contemplation. As they realized the pure figure of Nyorai, they would realize the prajna (insight leading to enlightenment), that it could become nothing else and they could become one with Nyorai.
